009package imagingbook.violajones.lib;
010
011import java.awt.Rectangle;
012
013/**
014 * Merely a rectangle which can check for overlap with another rectangle.
015 * @author WB
016 *
017 */
018public class FaceRegion extends Rectangle {
019        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
020
021        public FaceRegion(int x, int y, int w, int h) {
022                super(x, y, w, h);
023        }
024        
025        // TODO: check!!
026        public boolean overlaps(Rectangle r2, double sizeFac) {
027                final double sizeFac1 = 1 + sizeFac;
028                int distance = (int) (this.width * sizeFac);
029                if (r2.x <= this.x + distance && r2.x >= this.x - distance
030                                && r2.y <= this.y + distance && r2.y >= this.y - distance
031                                && r2.width <= (int) (this.width * sizeFac1)
032                                && (int) (r2.width * sizeFac1) >= this.width) {
033                        return true;
034                }
035                if (this.x >= r2.x && this.x + this.width <= r2.x + r2.width && this.y >= r2.y
036                                && this.y + this.height <= r2.y + r2.height) {
037                        return true;
038                }
039                        
040                return false;
041        }
042
043}
